variable.name: clinic
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: edicyear
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: edicyrb
variable.description: Last EDIC year

variable.name: form
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified date form completed

variable.name: iob0a
variable.description: B0a. Recognition of event. Conformation of cardiovascular events. Myocardial infarction

variable.name: iob0b
variable.description: B0b. Recognition of event. Conformation of cardiovascular events. Angina pectoris

variable.name: iob0c
variable.description: B0c. Recognition of event. Conformation of cardiovascular events. Coronary artery disease

variable.name: iob0d
variable.description: B0d. Recognition of event. Conformation of cardiovascular events. Arrhythmia

variable.name: iob1adat
variable.description: B1. Recognition of event. De-identified date of occurrence

variable.name: iob1b
variable.description: B1. Recognition of event. Specify date of events. Check here if date uncertain

variable.name: iob2bdat
variable.description: B2. Recognition of event. De-identified date clinic learned of the event

variable.name: iob3
variable.description: B3. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: iob4a
variable.description: B4a.Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? Emergency room

variable.name: iob4b
variable.description: B4b. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? In-patient hospitalization

variable.name: iob4c
variable.description: B4c. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? De-identified EDIC clinic

variable.name: iob4d
variable.description: B4d. Was the patient treated within a health care facility for this event? Other, specify

variable.name: ioc
variable.description: C. Chest pain. If no pain skip

variable.name: ioc1ai
variable.description: C1. Chest pain: left anterior chest

variable.name: ioc1aii
variable.description: C1. Chest pain: left arm

variable.name: ioc1aiii
variable.description: C1. Chest pain: jaw

variable.name: ioc1aiv
variable.description: C1. Chest pain: sternum upper/middle

variable.name: ioc1av
variable.description: C1. Chest pain: sternum lower

variable.name: ioc1bi
variable.description: C1. Pain involve: the back

variable.name: ioc1bii
variable.description: C1. Pain involve: the shoulder

variable.name: ioc1biii
variable.description: C1. Pain involve: the right arm

variable.name: ioc1biv
variable.description: C1. Pain involve: abdomen or both sides

variable.name: ioc2a
variable.description: C2. Did pain last more than 20 minutes

variable.name: ioc2b
variable.description: C2. Non-cardiac cause for the pain

variable.name: ioc2c
variable.description: C2. Self-administered without relief/pain

variable.name: ioc3
variable.description: C3. Patient ever had feeling of pressure

variable.name: ioc4a
variable.description: C4a. Did you get this pain when you walk

variable.name: ioc4b
variable.description: C4b. Pain when you walk at an ordinary pace

variable.name: ioc4c
variable.description: C4c. When you get this pain what do you do

variable.name: ioc4d
variable.description: C4d. What happens to pain / stand still

variable.name: ioc4e
variable.description: C4e. How soon does the pain go away

variable.name: ioc5
variable.description: C5. Any diagnostic tests performed?

variable.name: ioc5res1
variable.description: C5. What were the results? Result 1

variable.name: ioc5res2
variable.description: C5. What were the results? Result 2

variable.name: ioc5res3
variable.description: C5. What were the results? Result 3

variable.name: ioc5res4
variable.description: C5. What were the results? Result 4

variable.name: ioc5res5
variable.description: C5. What were the results? Result 5

variable.name: ioc5tes1
variable.description: C5. What tests were performed? Test 1

variable.name: ioc5tes2
variable.description: C5. What tests were performed? Test 2

variable.name: ioc5tes3
variable.description: C5. What tests were performed? Test 3

variable.name: ioc5tes4
variable.description: C5. What tests were performed? Test 4

variable.name: ioc5tes5
variable.description: C5. What tests were performed? Test 5

variable.name: iod1a
variable.description: D1a. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: CPK at least twice upper limit

variable.name: iod1b
variable.description: D1b. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: what was the CPK value

variable.name: iod2a
variable.description: D2a. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: was CPK-MB present

variable.name: iod2b
variable.description: D2b. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: what was the CPK-MB value

variable.name: iod3a
variable.description: D3a. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: either CPK-MB heart fraction

variable.name: iod3b1
variable.description: D3b1. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: CPK-MB heart fraction

variable.name: iod3b2
variable.description: D3b2. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: LDH

variable.name: iod3b3
variable.description: D3b3. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: SGOT

variable.name: iod4
variable.description: D4. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: was there a known non-ischemic

variable.name: iod4oth
variable.description: D4. Enzyme changes. Enzyme: specify, other

variable.name: ioeecg
variable.description: E. Are ECG tracings attached?

variable.name: iofhosre
variable.description: F. Are hospital records attached?

variable.name: iogcard
variable.description: G. Outcome of event: cardiology follow-up

variable.name: iogmed
variable.description: G. Outcome of event: medication

variable.name: iogoth
variable.description: G. Outcome of event: other, specify:

variable.description: G. Outcome of event: surgery

variable.name: iogtpa
variable.description: G. Outcome of event: TPA

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID
